description: Openstack dashboard using the Openstack Exporter (https://github.com/openstack-exporter/openstack-exporter)

panels.description: Overcommit metric based off regional deployment values. This must be updated to match the allocation ratio per the deployment configs
panels.title: Overall CPU cores usage

panels.description: This is the total vCPU limits allocated to projects/tenants
panels.title: vCPUs Total Limits By Project

panels.description: This is how many vCPU's are used by individual projects/tenants
panels.title: vCPUs Limits Used By Project

panels.description: This takes in to account the overcommit allocation ratio
panels.title: vCPU core overcommit usage percentage

panels.description: Details of instances that are stuck in a state other than ACTIVE
panels.title: Non-Active Instance Details

title: OpenStack Exporter
